title: Open aws s3 bucket s3://rubyci
content:
Hello team,
Description:
<image_0>
PFA screenshot.
Thanks,
Sandeep

screenshots.image_0: Ruby amazon aws bucket https://rubyci.s3.amazonaws.com is open with read only privilege which allows any authenticated aws user to read private files.

steps: Identify the open AWS S3 bucket by checking the bucket name s3://rubyci.
Access the bucket contents without any authentication or authorization checks.
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves an open AWS S3 bucket (s3://rubyci) that is publicly accessible without any authentication or authorization, allowing anyone to view, modify, or delete its contents.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires identifying the bucket name and attempting to access it without any credentials. There are no complex interactions or multiple components involved.
